title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node, Deno and browsers; chat, stream, pull models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chat with multiple sessions, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy search, conversation history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to chat with Ollama models inside the editor, generate code, refactor or explain snippets.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Minimal repo showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama and use them for semantic search.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Retrieval-augmented-generation template using Ollama, Chroma and LangChain to chat over your documents.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Lightweight multi-agent orchestration framework built on top of Ollama for local autonomous workflows.

title: ollama-digital-assistant
summary: macOS menu-bar app that lets you query Ollama models from anywhere via hotkey and clipboard.

title: ollama-telegram-bot
summary: Self-hosted Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to Ollama and supports multi-model conversations and file uploads.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and strongly-typed models.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client library for Ollama offering idiomatic APIs and context cancellation.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to Ollama’s REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: Awesome-Ollama
summary: Curated list of tools, libraries, tutorials and integrations in the Ollama ecosystem.
